channel.title: Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now
channel.description:
Having issues all day **connecting my axo to my computer**. A failure to Connect, its boots me off with: Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now
Tried disconnecting cables, rebooting my computer a few times, new cables etc. Has been pretty stable up to now. (Am using Firmware version: 1.0.0.1)
Whats the deal? My Sunday of patching has turned to mud.

item.title: Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

if you download the newest editor, you should be asked if you want to upgrade the firmware automatically.
do you really have version 1.0.0.1? EDIT: ah i see, everything fine! sorry firmware says indeed 1.0.0.1 on mine as well. it is just the software that says 1.0.12-etc.

SORRY for the noise

Read full topic

item.title: Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now
item.dc:creator: @EarthTemple M
item.description:
@EarthTemple wrote:

Ok lokki, um I'm searching for the firmware now..

Read full topic

item.title: Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

EarthTemple:

Am using Firmware version: 1.0.0.1

glad you got it sorted!

you should update your firmware...

Read full topic

item.title: Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now
item.dc:creator: @EarthTemple M
item.description:
@EarthTemple wrote:

SOLVED. I narrowed it down to the scope.. then opened it up (for the second time). Wire came loose from the OLED inside the box.

Read full topic
